hashtag#hiring *Sales Manager*, Mumbai, *India*, fulltime hashtag#opentowork hashtag#Mumbaijobs hashtag#Maharashtrajobs hashtag#SalesMarketing hashtag#JobsInmaharashtra hashtag#maharashtrajobs hashtag#mumbaijobs hashtag#marathi hashtag#maharashtra*To Apply -->*: https://lnkd.in/dUse__4r We're looking for a people-person who loves conversations, storytelling, and of course  weddings!At KnotsbyAMP, we create timeless memories for couples on their biggest day. And the first person they usually talk to  is YOU!This isn't your typical sales job. Think of it as becoming friends with excited couples, understanding their wedding dreams, and helping them bring us on board as their photographers.Your Day Might Look Like:Chatting with a couple over coffee (or Zoom), hearing about their love story.Helping them figure out which of our photography and filmmaking services best suit their vibe.Being their go-to person from the first hello till the booking.Sometimes even joining the team on shoots (yes, you get to experience real wedding madness and magic first-hand!)Following up, closing sales, and celebrating each win like it's your own.Who Should Apply:If you love talking to new people and can build trust quickly.If you're good at storytelling and making people feel heard.Both freshers and experienced folks are welcome (If you've been in sales, client servicing, or even hospitality, that's a bonus).Someone who enjoys the idea of being part of a creative, fast-moving wedding photography team.

hashtag#hiring *Sales Manager*, Mumbai, *India*, fulltime hashtag#opentowork hashtag#Mumbaijobs hashtag#Maharashtrajobs hashtag#SalesMarketing hashtag#JobsInmaharashtra hashtag#maharashtrajobs hashtag#mumbaijobs hashtag#marathi hashtag#maharashtra*To Apply -->*: https://lnkd.in/dUse__4r We're looking for a people-person who loves conversations, storytelling, and of course  weddings!At KnotsbyAMP, we create timeless memories for couples on their biggest day. And the first person they usually talk to  is YOU!This isn't your typical sales job. Think of it as becoming friends with excited couples, understanding their wedding dreams, and helping them bring us on board as their photographers.Your Day Might Look Like:Chatting with a couple over coffee (or Zoom), hearing about their love story.Helping them figure out which of our photography and filmmaking services best suit their vibe.Being their go-to person from the first hello till the booking.Sometimes even joining the team on shoots (yes, you get to experience real wedding madness and magic first-hand!)Following up, closing sales, and celebrating each win like it's your own.Who Should Apply:If you love talking to new people and can build trust quickly.If you're good at storytelling and making people feel heard.Both freshers and experienced folks are welcome (If you've been in sales, client servicing, or even hospitality, that's a bonus).Someone who enjoys the idea of being part of a creative, fast-moving wedding photography team.

Think of it as becoming friends with excited couples, understanding their wedding dreams, and helping them bring us on board as their photographers.Your Day Might Look Like:Chatting with a couple over coffee (or Zoom), hearing about their love story.Helping them figure out which of our photography and filmmaking services best suit their vibe.Being their go-to person from the first hello till the booking.Sometimes even joining the team on shoots (yes, you get to experience real wedding madness and magic first-hand!)Following up, closing sales, and celebrating each win like it's your own.Who Should Apply:If you love talking to new people and can build trust quickly.If you're good at storytelling and making people feel heard.Both freshers and experienced folks are welcome (If you've been in sales, client servicing, or even hospitality, that's a bonus).Someone who enjoys the idea of being part of a creative, fast-moving wedding photography team.

Think of it as becoming friends with excited couples, understanding their wedding dreams, and helping them bring us on board as their photographers.Your Day Might Look Like:Chatting with a couple over coffee (or Zoom), hearing about their love story.Helping them figure out which of our photography and filmmaking services best suit their vibe.Being their go-to person from the first hello till the booking.Sometimes even joining the team on shoots (yes, you get to experience real wedding madness and magic first-hand!)Following up, closing sales, and celebrating each win like it's your own.Who Should Apply:If you love talking to new people and can build trust quickly.If you're good at storytelling and making people feel heard.Both freshers and experienced folks are welcome (If you've been in sales, client servicing, or even hospitality, that's a bonus).Someone who enjoys the idea of being part of a creative, fast-moving wedding photography team.
